name: Zombie Shooting Apocalypse X (a jump shooter survival game)
name_original: Zombie Shooting Apocalypse X (a jump shooter survival game)
description:
Deadly zombies have risen from the ashes to kill mankind. It's your job to protect the human's and blast them zombies big time.

FEATURES
=> 30 challenging levels with lots of zombie enemies
=> Amazing jungle environment
=> Collect coins to unlock new levels
=> Plenty of action, killing, shooting and challenges
=> Dumb proof control - anyone can play
=> A perfect time killer with loads of fun

With quick pace levels which only take seconds to finish, the excitement is hard and fast. Download it now.

Happy Zombie Killing :)
